В игре присутствует прокачка и шесть различных перков, у каждого же есть свои особенности.

Killing Floor is the pristine original copy of the 1899 game "Floors" In this game you kill floors, get points for cleaning off dirt and killing grime. A great game for all those people who just love floors.



On a serious note this game will give serious motion sickness if you're prone to it, I feel like shit after playing this game for more than half an hour, they have how ever fixed this in KF2 where killing dirty floors was never better.
This game is great, just get it if you love wave survival games.

Killing floor est le jeu FPS survival horror le mieux abouti ! Les classes en dispositon sont efficaces dans leur façon. La durée de Vie est conséquente ( à vous de voir ). Les armes qui ont un bon caractère et leur signification qui permet de savourer à chacun d'eux. Une communautée importante et efficace. Un jeux où tout pc de maintenant peut le mettre facilement sans être moche.
Pour un prix allégeante dont des réductions qui apparés souvent sur steam.
Ce jeux doit être obligatoirement dans votre bibliothèque de jeux. C'est un jeux incontournable.
C'est à vous de le tester et c'est à vous de continuer le carnage.

Für jemanden der gerne im Co-op daddelt, ist Killing Floor genau das richtige!

Bis zu 6 Spieler können es hier versuchen, gegen Gegnerhorden die Wellenweise kommen, zu Überleben. Besonders Cool und gelungen finde ich hier die ZED-Time (bullettime), die wenn einsetzt, JEDER spieler zeitgleich erlebt! Mit der hochlevelung des richtigen Perks, kann man diese dann auch Verlängern!

Es macht richtig Fun mit Freunden zusammen auf "Metzel"-Tour zu gehen, da jede menge Blut und rumfliegende Körperteile, hier an Oberster stelle stehen! :D

Kauf lohnt sich definitiv! :D

Um dos melhores jogos de suvivor que já joguei, a mecânica do jogo é simples, assim como a jogabilidade, o que faz com que seja fácil para um inciante se sair bem. Esse jogo tem mais de 10 anos, e ainda possui muita gente jogando, isso prova como o jogo é reconhecido. A versão pra Linux tem alguns bugs, como o fato de a única forma de evoluir seu personagem é jogando solo, pelo menos aqui, se jogar coop meu progresso não é salvo, resetando no inicio de cada partida. Atualmente jogo no servidor C|AK [IP: 198.245.50.224:7707] tem muita gente lá, é um servidor bastabte modificado. Agora estou esperando Killing Floor 2 sair para Linux.

[h1]Intro[/h1] 

Killing Floor is a Co-op survival Shoot 'em up were you have 10 waves of specimens (zombies) and you and your team have to simply survive and kill all the specimens. This is the hole game which seems like it will soon get boring after while but because its done so well you can play the game for hours at a time.

[h1]Good Points[/h1]
[list]
[*] One of Killing Floors best things is the replay value since you can play for hours at a time. There are a massive amount of maps to choose from, events such as Christmas and Halloween, 100s of Achievements and a massive amount of fun. These things put together makes great replay value.

[*] Guns is a big part in Killing Floor because you will always use them to shoot and kill every specimen you see. Its very satisfying and never gets old, there are loads of weapons to pick from so you cant get bored of them.

[*] The controls are simple in a good way, they are not very hard to get used to and you will know everyone after an hour.

[*] Specimens are really unique and they all have there own special abilities, there are 10 different types of specimens and thats not including the boss at the end. This always keeps the game play going and makes each game feel different.

[*] Killing Floor is a very challenging game to start off with, but as you play you will get better and start playing different difficulty which can be really hard. You will die a lot but that gives you more reason to keep playing because you want to beat the level.

[*] The length of the game depends of how long you want to play it. You can keep playing for a long as you want and most of the time you wont get bored. Some people manage to put 1000s of hours into Killing Floor and still play to this day.

[*] The price it worth it but its always on sale every couple of months so I would recommend waiting a little bit since you can save a bit of dosh.

[*] There are six different classes to choose from such as Sharpshooter to Firebug. There is a class that suits you which you can level up to get better at the class, this helps and keeps you playing.

[*] The Killing Floor community are really nice and will help you get Achievements as well as helping you in any other way they can. The game is over 5 years old and people are still playing in the thousands which is rare for most games.
[/list]
[h1]Bad Points[/h1]
[list]
[*] As I said about the game being over 5 years old, this means the game may soon die within a year of two. As well and Killing Floor 2 coming out this means it will never be as big as it was. But its still worth the money for now since you will get enjoyment out of the game.
[/list]

[h1]Overall[/h1]

Overall I think that Killing Floor is a great fun game to play with friends and wont get boring, its considered a classing for PC gamers and is still great fun today. I would recommend this game to anyone who has Steam. I would give Killing Floor 9 out of 10.

Могу сказать одно, что игра очень крутая...она подарила мне много часов безудержного истребления зомби, фишка в том, что я был очень удивлен поиграв первый раз в такую игру, в которой нет прицела...да-да, вы не ослышались - в игре нет прицела, это и придаёт ей особенную элегантность, все битвы просхидят между людми и ботами, очень много различных карт....есть свои приколюхи, на подобии того, что можно бегать, искать и подбирать оружие в разных точках на карте, при том что никогда не угадаешь какое оружие и где лежит...есть система перков с последующим повышением своих навыков набивая всё больше и больше урона и становлясь всё сильнее и сильнее, конечно всё даётся не сразу, приходиться потратить много усилий))но это пустяки))ну и в конце концов есть много всяких достижений, некоторые из них открывают дополнительные скины к игре...в игре много скинов, хотя большенство из них платные как и скины оружия....я остался очень доволен этой игрой, спасибо Tripware и steam))
